item.title: Night owl bitcoin traders: Soon there'll be an ETF just for you
item.description: If approved, the Nicholas Bitcoin and Treasuries AfterDark ETF would buy and sell bitcoin-linked financial instruments outside U.S. trading hours.

item.description: Cash rates have gone down alongside Federal Reserve rate cuts. How much you should hold and where to stash it.
